about_the_game:
Take on the role of an Exile—a sinner in the eyes of those in power, banished to the Mist to serve the church by hunting and destroying the Mistborn. The Mist is believed to be a divine punishment, sent by gods to chastise sinners and non-believers.

A life without death, yet an opportunity for freedom... if the Mist is to be vanquished.

The Infernal Mist is a fresh take on the Action Roguelite genre by combining free-roaming exploration, with souls-like inspired third-person hack-and-slash combat. You descend into different Realms of the Mist as an Exile, and your goal is to awaken their wardens, defeat them, and finally take back your freedom from the grasp of the Mist while discovering the secrets behind its malevolent existence.

Within each realm of the Mist, you will collect souls of the Mist from your enemies, use them to unlock the powers of the Forsaken Gods, and shatter the hearts of the mists to awaken their Wardens while surviving the rotting power of the Mist that seeps through your soul.

Main features :

  • Experience fast-paced souls-like inspired combat with free-roaming rogue-lite progression.

  • Bend the knee to the Forsaken Gods and use their powers to create new builds each time.

  • Unlock new weapons, and mix and match their skills to annihilate your enemies.

  • Unlock and craft gameplay-changing Heirlooms that open new doors to unique builds.

  • Challenge yourself by experimenting with Curses of the Mist and create your own level of difficulty.

  • Bring justice to the Wardens, evolving boss fights that change and adapt based on your choices.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 64bit
  • Processor: INTEL CORE I5-8400 or AMD RYZEN 3 3300X
  • Memory: 12 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 6GBs VRAM | NVIDIA GTX-1060 | AMD Radeon RX 580
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 45 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: 720p Low Quality Settings (30FPS) | SSD (Preferred) | HDD (Supported)
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10/11 64bit
  • Processor: intel i7 8700 | AMD Ryzen 5 3600
  • Memory: 16 MB RAM
  • Graphics: 8GBs VRAM | NVIDIA GEFORCE GTX 1070 8 GB or AMD RADEON RX VEGA 56 8 GB
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 45 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: 1080p High Quality Settings (60FPS) | SSD Required

short_description: Descend into the Infernal Mist. A MistCrawler Roguelite where you explore, and Hack and Slash your way through the Mist, while surviving the encroaching darkness. Collect Souls of the Mist, unlock god-like powers and weapons, challenge the merciless wardens, and face the King of the Mist.
